content: i designed this cute floral square for granny square day 2023 this little flower motif is worked in the round with a textured puffy centre 3d petals then turned into a square ready to be used within any project a blanket cushion bag or even a cardigan i used knitcraft cotton blend dk with a 4mm hook for a 10cm 4 square i used yellow for the middles white for the petals then a mixture of hot pink & coral for the background squares i also made some with hand dyed scraps paired with stylecraft bamboo cotton could use any yarn and would make a great stashbusting project using up small amounts for the flowers this square is dedicated to my niece evie who inspired me to make this fun and joyful square the name evie means life or woman who enjoys life i hope you enjoy making it to see more of my work please find me on instagram @the_burrow_uk you may sell finished items using this pattern but please credit me alice tarry as the designer please do not copy share video or redistribute this pattern thank you two pdf s uk & us terminology
